description:
Wrap this compact lock around trees, posts or fences where a U-lock won't work. It unfurls to a length of 80cm to fit around big or oddly shaped objects.

  • 5mm thick hardened steel bars are coated with soft uGrip coating
  • Bars and body are made of specially hardened steel
  • Link construction with special rivets allows for compact folding
  • Key can stay in the lock during transport and does not interfere with pedaling
  • Frame attachment with velcro or bottle holder screws
  • Quick-access bracket
  • Includes 2 keys
  • Abus security rating of 7/15
name: Abus Bordo uGrip 5700/80 SH Folding Lock
